meta.description: A few weeks ago face masks were said to be useless and even dangerous against COVID-19. Now, people are urged to wear them and some cities are making them mandatory. Was this complete 180 made for health reasons? Or to create a specific social climate?

title: The Face Mask: A Powerful Symbol of COVID Oppression
cleaned_text: After two months of COVID-19 panic and terror, the world is now being ushered into a "new normal". However, there is nothing "new" nor "normal" about an oppressive police state that haphazardly revokes rights and freedoms while citizens snitch on eac
